nemomedusR 0.0.1
  • Functions

Reference

Boundaries

Extract data along transects and perimeters.

to_segments()

Break an SF linestring into segments at corners

boundaries()

Create a series of transects along the boundaries of model compartments

check_grid()

Check if a segment runs parallel to latitude or longitude

direction()

Test whether "positive" currents flow in or out of a model compartment at a segment

Sample()

Sample water flows across transects along the boundaries of model compartments

Sample_OOB()

Sample along the external boundaries of the model domain

extract()

Extract the values from a grid under transects along the external boundaries of the model domain

extract_OOB()

Extract the values from a grid under transects along the external boundaries of the model domain

NEMO-MEDUSA

Spatial tools

Handle spatial weighting for averages, depth layers, and map projections.

empty()

Check Whether a Vector Contains Data

get_weights()

Calculate Water Layer Thicknesses Within an Array

get_weights.W()

Calculate Water Layer Thicknesses Within an Array (Velocities)

get_weights.old()

Calculate Water Layer Thicknesses Within an Array (Detritus)

calculate_depth_share()

Calculate Water Layer Thicknesses Within a Vector

get_spatial() get_spatial()

Get Latitudes, Longitudes, & Depths

Window()

Get Indices to Use When Clipping netcdf Files at Import

reproj()

Reproject from Latitude and Longitude to Project CRS

sfc_as_cols()

Pull Coordinates from a Simple Feature Geometry Column

voronoi_grid()

Calculate the Domain Area per Grid Point

vectors_2_direction()

Convert a U-V velocity field to speed and direction in degrees

Variable extractors

Extract ecological driving data.

get_air()

Get Surface Irradiance & Air Temperature

get_air_dt()

Get Surface Irradiance & Air Temperature

get_bio()

Get Dissolved Inorganic Nitrogen & Chlorophyll a

get_detritus()

Get Detritus

get_ice()

Get Ice Pesence & Thickness, & Snow Thickness

get_sea()

Get Salinity, Temperature & Sea Ice Concentration

get_merid()

Get Meridional Currents

get_zonal()

Get Zonal Currents

get_vertical()

Get Vertical Velocity and Vertical Eddy Diffusivity

get_rivers()

Get Rivers

interp_month()

Interpolate vertical water movements to the boundary depth between shallow and deep compartments

stratify()

Summarise Across Depths in a NEMO-MEDUSA Array

type_in_month()

Condense Daily netcdf Files into a Month by Type

whole_month()

Condense Daily netcdf Files into a Monthly Summary

detritus_month()

Condense Daily netcdf Files into a Monthly Summary

Averages

Average driving data into time series or decadal maps.

decadal()

Prepare for Averaging by Decade

strip_ice()

Strip Snow and Ice Variables at Depth

summarise_sp()

Average into Decadal Grids

summarise_ts()

Average into Time Series

summarise_ts_detritus()

Average into Detrital Time Series

Plotting

Make plots.

point_plot()

Map Spatial Summaries

ts_plot()

Plot Temporal Summaries

stick_plot()

Create Stick Plots to Show Currents
